original_title: Donald Lawrence and the Tri-City Singers:Finale
overview: Limited 2 DVD set containing the entire two night event. Filmed in High Definition with 5.1 surround sound. Lots of bonus content on each DVD. Beautiful packaging with extensive 16-page booklet documenting the historic event. The final concert by this Stellar Award winning gospel choir under the direction of Donald Lawrence.
title: Donald Lawrence and the Tri-City Singers:Finale
